itemDescription: Northern Irish international lawn & indoor bowler

wikipedia_page.main: Erin Smith is a Northern Irish international lawn & indoor bowler.

response: Erin Smith (born August 16, 1972) in Washington, D.C., is best known for being the guitarist of riot grrrl band Bratmobile, a band with drummer Molly Neuman and vocalist Allison Wolfe.
